name: HellBound (itch) (wakstein)
description:
This game is a scholl project. The goal was to creat a concept and make a prototype of it on unity in 10 days.

HellBound is an FPS-RPG set in an horrific world where the player kill monsters in order to get loot which will make him more powerfull. The more ennemi gets killed by his avatar the more he can progress into randomly-generated dungeons.
